name: Claude 3.7 Sonnet
description: Claude 3.7 Sonnet is Anthropic's latest mid-range model with significantly improved reasoning, coding abilities, and instruction following compared to earlier versions.

name: Claude Sonnet 4
description: high-performance model with exceptional reasoning and efficiency

name: Nova Pro
description: Amazon Bedrock's Nova Pro is a high-performance general-purpose model for enterprise AI applications. It excels in reasoning, writing, and solving complex problems.

name: Nova Lite
description: Amazon Bedrock's Nova Lite balances performance and cost, making it suitable for a wide range of general-purpose applications.

name: Nova Micro
description: Amazon Bedrock's Nova Micro is a small, fast, text only model, designed for cost-effective, high-throughput use cases where rapid responses are needed.
